00045     class cfg_base
00046     {        
00047     public:
00051         cfg_base(resource_manager& res_man)
00052         : res_man_(res_man)
00053         {            
00054         }
00055         
00056     protected:
00057         resource_manager& res_man_;
00058     };
00059     
00060     typedef boost::shared_ptr<cfg_base> cfg_base_ptr;
00061     
00065     class texture_cfg
00066     : public cfg_base
00067     { 
00068     public:
00073         texture_cfg(resource_manager& res_man, const std::string& p)
00074         : cfg_base(res_man)
00075         , path_(p)
00076         {
00077         }
00078         
00082         boost::shared_ptr<texture> get()
00083         {    
00084             if( boost::shared_ptr<texture> p = inst_.lock() )
00085             {            
00086                 // already exists outside of cfg
00087                 return p;
00088             }
00089             else
00090             {
00091                 boost::shared_ptr<texture> r = boost::shared_ptr<texture>( res_man_.get<texture>(path_) );
00092                 inst_ = r;
00093                 return r;
00094             }
00095         }
00096         
00097     private:        
00098         std::string               path_;
00099         boost::weak_ptr<texture>  inst_;
00100     };
00101     
00105     class sprite_cfg
00106     : public cfg_base
00107     {
00108     public:        
00115         sprite_cfg(resource_manager& res_man, 
00116                    texture_cfg& t, 
00117                    const point& p, const size& s)
00118         : cfg_base(res_man)
00119         , texture_(t)
00120         , origin_(p)
00121         , size_(s)
00122         {            
00123         }
00124         
00128         boost::shared_ptr<sprite> get()
00129         {
00130             if( boost::shared_ptr<sprite> p = inst_.lock() )
00131             {            
00132                 // already exists outside of cfg
00133                 return p;
00134             }
00135             else
00136             {
00137                 boost::shared_ptr<sprite> r = boost::shared_ptr<sprite>( new sprite(texture_.get(), origin_, size_) );
00138                 inst_ = r;
00139                 return r;
00140             }
00141         }
00142         
00143     private:
00144         texture_cfg&             texture_;
00145         point                    origin_;
00146         size                     size_;        
00147         boost::weak_ptr<sprite>  inst_;
00148     };

00157     class frame_cfg
00158     {
00159         friend class animation_cfg;
00160         
00161     public:        
00166         frame_cfg(const std::string& spr, const float& d=0.0f)
00167         : sprite_key_(spr)
00168         , duration_(d) // 0.0 or negative means use animation's default
00169         {            
00170         }
00171         
00172     private:
00173         std::string                 sprite_key_;
00174         float                       duration_;
00175     };

00177     class configuration;

00183     class animation_cfg
00184     : public cfg_base
00185     {
00186     public:  
00192         animation_cfg(resource_manager& res_man, configuration& cfg, const float& d)
00193         : cfg_base(res_man)
00194         , config_(cfg)
00195         , duration_(d)
00196         {            
00197         }
00198         
00204         void add(const frame_cfg& f)
00205         {
00206             frames_.push_back(f);
00207         }
00208         
00212         boost::shared_ptr<animation> get();
00213         
00214     private:
00215         configuration&              config_;
00216         float                       duration_;
00217         std::vector<frame_cfg>      frames_;
00218         boost::weak_ptr<animation>  inst_;
00219     };

00225     class camera_cfg
00226     : public cfg_base
00227     {
00228     public:    
00236         camera_cfg(resource_manager& res_man, const size& f, 
00237                    float rot, float zm, const vector_2d& pos)
00238         : cfg_base(res_man)
00239         , frustum_(f)
00240         , rotation_(rot)
00241         , zoom_(zm)
00242         , position_(pos)
00243         {            
00244         }
00245          
00249         boost::shared_ptr<camera> get()
00250         {
00251             if( boost::shared_ptr<camera> p = inst_.lock() )
00252             {            
00253                 // already exists outside of cfg
00254                 return p;
00255             }
00256             else
00257             {
00258                 boost::shared_ptr<camera> r = boost::shared_ptr<camera>( new camera(frustum_) );
00259                 r->position(position_);                
00260                 r->zoom(zoom_);
00261                 r->rotation(rotation_);
00262                 inst_ = r;
00263                 return r;
00264             }
00265         }
00266         
00267     private:
00268         size                     frustum_;
00269         float                    rotation_;
00270         float                    zoom_;
00271         vector_2d                position_;
00272         boost::weak_ptr<camera>  inst_;
00273     };

00317     class input_cfg
00318     : public cfg_base
00319     {
00320     public:      
00327         input_cfg(resource_manager& res_man, kernel& k, bool want_touch, bool want_accel)
00328         : cfg_base(res_man)
00329         , kernel_(k)
00330         , want_touch_(want_touch)
00331         , want_accel_(want_accel)
00332         {            
00333         }
00334         
00338         boost::shared_ptr<input_manager> get()
00339         {
00340             if( boost::shared_ptr<input_manager> p = inst_.lock() )
00341             {            
00342                 // already exists outside of cfg
00343                 return p;
00344             }
00345             else
00346             {
00347                 boost::shared_ptr<input_manager> r = 
00348                     boost::shared_ptr<input_manager>( 
00349                         new input_manager(kernel_, want_touch_, want_accel_) );
00350                 inst_ = r;
00351                 return r;
00352             }
00353         }
00354         
00355     private:
00356         kernel&                         kernel_;
00357         bool                            want_touch_;
00358         bool                            want_accel_;
00359         boost::weak_ptr<input_manager>  inst_;
00360     };

00400 
00404         template <typename T>
00405         const boost::shared_ptr<T> create()
00406         {
00407             return boost::shared_ptr<T>( new T(kernel_, config_, traits_) );
00408         }
00409         
00415         const boost::shared_ptr<object> create()
00416         {
00417             return boost::shared_ptr<object>( new object(kernel_, config_, traits_) );            
00418         }
00419         
00420     private:
00421         configuration&  config_;
00422         kernel&         kernel_;
00423         object_traits   traits_;
00424 //        boost::weak_ptr<sprite>  inst_;
00425     };
